home.title: AI Video Translation
home.subtitle: Upload a video or paste a YouTube link to get started
Input any language in natural language,: Input any language in natural language, as long as llm can understand
Whether to burn subtitles into the video: Whether to burn subtitles into the video, will increase processing time
Recommended for videos with loud backgro: Recommended for videos with loud background noise, but will increase processing time
Please refer to Github homepage for GPT_: Please refer to Github homepage for GPT_SoVITS configuration
Mode 1: Use provided reference audio onl: Mode 1: Use provided reference audio only
Mode 2: Use first audio from video as re: Mode 2: Use first audio from video as reference
Mode 3: Use each audio from video as ref: Mode 3: Use each audio from video as reference
Configure reference audio mode for GPT-S: Configure reference audio mode for GPT-SoVITS

Hello, welcome to VideoLingo. If you enc: Hello, welcome to VideoLingo. If you encounter any issues, feel free to get instant answers with our Free QA Agent here! You can also try out our SaaS website at videolingo.io for free!
Local runtime requires >8GB GPU, cloud r: Local runtime requires >8GB GPU, cloud runtime requires 302ai API key, elevenlabs runtime requires ElevenLabs API key

proxyTooltip: HTTP proxy address for downloading HuggingFace models, e.g. http://127.0.0.1:10809
hfMirrorTooltip: HuggingFace mirror site URL, China users can use https://hf-mirror.com
ttsApiKeyTooltip: API key required for the TTS service
speechRateTooltip: Speech synthesis speed multiplier, 1.0 is normal speed
confirmRestartSubtitleDesc: This will clear all intermediate files from subtitle processing (logs, translation cache, subtitle files, etc.). Original video and audio will be preserved.
confirmRestartDubbingDesc: This will clear all intermediate files from dubbing processing (audio segments, reference audio, etc.). Original video and subtitles will be preserved.
cleanupSuccess: Cleanup complete, ready to restart processing
dubbingRequiresSubtitle: Complete subtitle processing first before dubbing
Subtitle: Subtitle
sf_fish_tts_desc: Supports 3 modes: preset voices, custom clone (upload audio on SiliconFlow console), dynamic clone (auto-extract reference audio from source video)
sf_fish_tts_mode_tooltip: preset: use preset voices; custom: use uploaded custom voice on SiliconFlow; dynamic: auto-extract reference audio from source video for cloning
openai_tts_desc: OpenAI official TTS via 302.ai. Only 6 fixed voices available, no voice cloning. Good quality for general use.
fish_tts_desc: Fish Audio community voice library via 302.ai. Large collection of trained character voices (anime, celebrities), click üé≠ to browse more.
fish_tts_character_tooltip: Find more character voices on Fish Audio, add their IDs to config.yaml
azure_tts_desc: Microsoft Azure TTS via 302.ai. Multiple languages and high-quality preset voices, no voice cloning. Great for professional dubbing.
gpt_sovits_desc: Locally deployed GPT-SoVITS, requires training your own voice models. Most flexible but needs GPU and training data. Full custom voice cloning.
edge_tts_desc: Microsoft Edge TTS, completely free with no API key needed. Multiple languages and voices, decent quality. Good for testing or budget scenarios.
edge_tts_voice_tooltip: Run edge-tts --list-voices to see all available voices
sf_cosyvoice2_desc: SiliconFlow CosyVoice2 voice cloning. Auto-extracts reference audio from each sentence in source video to preserve original voice characteristics. Recommended!
f5tts_desc: F5-TTS voice cloning via 302.ai. Auto-extracts reference audio from source video for cloning, similar to original voice.
custom_tts_desc: Custom TTS interface, implement your own TTS logic in core/tts_backend/custom_tts.py. For advanced users.
cleanupAllTooltip: Clear all processing files and start over
confirmCleanupAllDesc: This will delete all processing intermediate files (audio, subtitles, logs, translation cache, etc.), only the original video will be preserved. Are you sure you want to start over?
cleanupAllSuccess: All cache cleared, you can start processing again
previewNotAvailable: Preview not available for this file type
